entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain or ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
